data.text: @RepDonBeyer Hey Donny. Did you see his speech in the rain yesterday at the cemetery? Go back to pedaling Volvos - it’s your only talent.
@RepDonBeyer Trump is afraid the rain might show his real face and expose his soul maybe

@Hunterhumphre14 @RepDonBeyer @realDonaldTrump Personally I don’t think Trump is intelligent enough to do that w/o it being obvious. Btw, I’m not speculating that there was Russian/Trump collusion. There’s enough info out there that it might be possible w/o having to speculate on anything. Investigation w/o obstruction is key

@RepDonBeyer Um, prolly should check up on your history. The "free world" was not a consideration in WWI, rather that slaughter was a classic example of uncontrolled escalation. It DID however, along with the treaty of Versailles, directly lead to WWII. A war important to the free world.

@RepDonBeyer This is a juvenile jab at Trump.  WWI ended TOMORROW, not today.  
That 'solemn ceremony' that they're "suffering through" is supremely convenient for THEM, being on a Saturday (Jewish Sabbath).  But the REAL DAY isn't until tomorrow.  They won't be there.

@bigjrey @RepDonBeyer I fought for this country. Both my father, in Vietnam, and grandfather, in WWII, fought for this country. We all watched friends die in battle for this nation. The least he could do is brave a little rain.

@RepDonBeyer There was no concept of a "free world" vs. an unfree world in those days. That's a Cold War concept. Germany, Austro-Hungary, and the Ottoman Empire weren't the Soviet Union.  The UK, Russia, France, and USA were not fighting to save democracy from totalitarianism.
